website_summaries.verdict: The convenience of the included mesh storage bag with this set of 8 bags makes this a valuable purchase.
pros: Bags are filled with sand, so they bounce less than those filled with corn
Weather resistant to ensure they won’t develop mildew
Extremely durable and high quality, allowing users to repeatedly play with these bags
cons: Bags may produce white, powdery residue

customer_reviews.title: Best bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my. When you wanna bring your A game bring these star spangled beauties. There is so much to love about these bags and zero to hate. Less you hate Merica then you probably hate corn hole, cold beer, and having a good time. The weight perfect. Not like that girl I brought home late from the bar the other night. The only thing that has better aerodynamics is the bald eagle that’s gonna be soaring high above your head while your tossing them. These bags having stopping power of a 50 cal dessert eagle even on the slickest of boards. So if your looking for the investment of a lifetime get these bags and keep calm and toss on!
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Hammond

customer_reviews.title: The "corn" inside disintegrates rapidly
customer_reviews.text: After about a week of play the material inside the bags started to disintegrate causing dust to fly which dirties up the board and is a messy affair. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dane714

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Colors vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: My family played this solid during our week long cousin camp and bags were out in the rain or night dew and dried well. Well constructed and look like they will last. We bought red and black, colors that could have easily run, and these have stayed true.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Barron

customer_reviews.title: Great table cloth weights.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our backyard table in which wind gusts will lift the table cloth. They hold perfectly and really don't get in the way. If someone says something nasty at the table it's easy to grab one and toss it at the offender. Minimal damage expected contingent upon velocity.
customer_reviews.author: The Ground Pounder

customer_reviews.title: Dust everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Bags seem nice right away, however, if you play a lot of corn hole they will begin to poof out white powder. After a year (only using in the summer) they now turn my boards completely white after a single game. They are nice material and weight, but become a pain with having to clean the boards ALL the time. Buying a different set to avoid this. Will keep these for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: No corn inside, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: There not like the corn bags that’s for sure. They are seems to be made with sand then in some sort of plastic bag then the double stitched material that’s wicked durable. Overall I am very happy with the purchase! No complaints and we have used them a bunch so far.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelJ83

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and really seem to be made well. I guess time will tell how well they are made. Only thing I dont really like is that there seems to be like a sheet plastic is inside which makes a crackle noise. But easy to look past since they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Weather resistant and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I tried making my own bean bags and they sucked majorly. I sucked up my pride and purchased these and have no regrets. Cornhole is now playable and we've had many fun nights with these. I even forgot about them once and left them outside in the rain with no harm done to them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Barlup

customer_reviews.title: Seam split on first day of play
customer_reviews.text: The corn hole bean bags at first glance appear quite nice. The colors are vibrant and they have good aesthetics. However, on the first day of play one bag split a seam. No rough housing just a father and son playing on a recently completed set built as a Covid weekend project. The other seven appear fine, just dissapointed in the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBob

customer_reviews.title: Tough, durable and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Heavy duck cloth and sewn well. Good price. We are making a couple of sets of the Cornhole game and glad I found these on Amazon to complete the sets.
customer_reviews.author: shayla cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Filled with sand. You can sense the plastic bag inside that holds the sand but not too obnoxious. It works very well for a game cornhole. We've played many games so far and they haven't shown any signs of fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: fun guy

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Picked the cheapest color that could be delivered the next day. Lo and behold they were delivered and work great. We shall see if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kenton Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery and accurate description.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used thus far. Rain has prevented my grandchildren from getting outside. Delivery was prompt and bags were as described.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Started to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: After using only a couple times stitching was falling apart. Able to fix by hand but shouldn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great color and material
customer_reviews.text: We made corn hole boards for Christmas presents and bought these bags to go with. Very good bags, filled perfectly, good material. Our veteran son in law loved the stars and stripes
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Cornhole Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! They are easy feeling in your hands. Well sewn and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: RWarren22

customer_reviews.title: well built!
customer_reviews.text: these did the trick as the replacement for cheaper ones that came with the boards we purchased!
customer_reviews.author: radioheader

customer_reviews.title: Half the price but same product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Good weight and great fabric! I am so glad I bought these instead of the more expensive version-they are just as well made and durable for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brandifaith

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Kids have enjoyed using these for their games and it has been a joy
customer_reviews.author: Drew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags/mesh carry case
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Comes in mesh carry bag. Was a great replacement for some of our bags that had gotten moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: these are bright and colorful They work great they are great for replacing torn bags or when ...
customer_reviews.text: these are bright and colorful They work great they are great for replacing torn bags or when building your own set of corn hole
customer_reviews.author: Kandy O

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: As described there are what the description says they are. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Craig Breakspear

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. We played after a rain, so the grass was wet, but these bags held up marvelously!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Price,quality
customer_reviews.text: From what I can tell good quality...can't wait to try em:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order again!
customer_reviews.text: Product description says it’s a bean bag, but it is actually filled with sand. Great quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Carie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. Played our first game and the bag split. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: PNW MCM

customer_reviews.title: Smaller / lighter than regulation
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than regulation. There’s also plastic or something that sounds like plastic inside the bag. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kids mom...

customer_reviews.title: These are LOUSY SAND-FILLED bags!
customer_reviews.text: Sand-filled bags are crappy! The bags don’t slide on the board. The sand starts poofing out of the sack leaving sand dust over the board making them stick even worse and scratching the board. Get actual corn-filled bags for best results or even bean-filled bags. Probably going to cut stitching, empty sand and fill with corn!
customer_reviews.author: AGrumm

customer_reviews.title: God Bless 'Merica
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and seem like they will last for many years
customer_reviews.author: Woodhunter

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good so far as we have not used then for more than a dozen times,
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product built a michigan corn hole board for son in-law he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Meisel

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, exactly what I wanted. I didn’t check to see if they are corn filled and they aren’t, but they work really well
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bags we ordered are made of a thick canvas type fabric and are very well made. Our family has been playing games every night for a week and they are holding up nicely. At first they are stiff, but it doesn't take long to wear them in. The customer service is also outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for what we needed them for, we used for our corn hole game.
customer_reviews.author: mommylife

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These were much better than anticipated. We bought flags and stripes. Material is very thick and feels like it will last. Very happy with the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Pimp Daddy Bri-Bri

customer_reviews.title: Throwers are not happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Good the first year. This year powder comes out with every throw
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne M. Tollefson

customer_reviews.title: outstanding material
customer_reviews.text: Great strong and durable material, can play for hours and no wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love the bags
customer_reviews.text: They came in a wonderful storage bag and are very durable. They are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Bags are perfect. As advertised and will use this vendor on my next cornhole boards project
customer_reviews.author: DWIGHT  HALL

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECCOMEND!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are NOT what we were wanting. The white powder that comes out every single time we play is rediculous. It gets all over us and our boards. I will never buy these again. Now I have to spend more money to try find good ones.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for corn hole game. Very well made, colors are nice. Arrived on time. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LA Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great, they are easy to toss. The colors are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Corn hole bags
customer_reviews.text: They worked good once they had been used and broke in
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rigsby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: They came very quick and they were perfect. I love the colors and the durability
customer_reviews.author: Carley Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality..bags have a exposed seam where they sewed shut.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Extreme dust from bags causing issues with hands
customer_reviews.text: The bags are filed with some type of white rock and the dust from the bags are terrible and leave dust all over the boards and get all over your hands. Cannot use them anymore and wish to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: David Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Good bean bags, but not the color I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bean bags, but i was sent the incorrect color so i can’t speak for how the Stars and Stripes look. Received my item on Friday for a party taking place Saturday so I can’t return the item either.
customer_reviews.author: atgxfhx

customer_reviews.title: Bag ripped after 2 games.
customer_reviews.text: The bags came sooner that expected, feel nice and throw nice. But we only used the bags 2x before one started to rip 😢 going to try to fix it. Would be nice if they would last a little longer before having to repair them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love for the most part
customer_reviews.text: One of the bags tore at the seams after just two occasions of playing. I had to sew it back together. Luckily there was an inner bag so nothing leaked out. Besides the tear we really like them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: They met our need perfectly and the game was a big hit
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These seem very well made, nice durable fabric and great colors. I ordered these because my daughter built my son a cornhole boards for Christmas and they will work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bags they’ve held up to I don’t know how many corner of the board hit and still are performing strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nnekka

customer_reviews.title: DUSTY
customer_reviews.text: The weight and feel of these bags is great, until you start using them. After a game or two they started giving off a lot of dust, turning the boards white. Would not recommend them. Looking for new bags now.
customer_reviews.author: Tonja Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sand fill. Not silicon beads
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see any description of exactly what fill was in these bags. Come to find out it’s sand. Not to happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: These bags took a beating at a large party. The cornhole game was a big hit and was in use for 14 hours. These bags were put in use and look like new after the whole day and night of continual use. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute but not with the price just for being cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Raboin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work good but give off a lot of white dust
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Ries

customer_reviews.title: Good, but questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, but bags started to tear within about 5 uses. I only played on grass and the seam began to tear already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mice like to eat the filling!
customer_reviews.text: Colors fade if left outside. Be sure to use the bag they came in.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Bought different ones
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and did not like the bags were not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: charmane mcdade

customer_reviews.title: Good bags for a good price. The design is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Good bags for a good price. The design is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MSG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible bags. Every time you throw one dust from inside comes out and by the end of 2 rounds there is a dust cloud around the entire cornhole game
customer_reviews.author: Sarah leavell

customer_reviews.title: high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with these bags, should definitely hold up to the Utah weather and comes with a carrying case which I didn't realize. super pleased with seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hoof

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It’s all chalk in the bags and they keep getting lighter and lighter
customer_reviews.author: Drake mills

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Nice thick material. Not flimsy or hard to work with. Great instructions. Coated over with Helsmen Polyurethane exterior. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That product is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and were part of a gift for our grand son. They were perfect and will use this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags, perfect for the 4th of July or anytime you want to show your patriotism with friends and family! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Got them fast and love them! Had a pair before this and these are def better quality all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the bean bags, but they are heavy, hard and one of them was lighter then the others
customer_reviews.author: tony m fontes

customer_reviews.title: Great bean bags
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the corn whole bean bags., Very well made. Can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black and blue bags and recieved yellow and blue bags Other then that, they're doable.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy should get many years of use from these. Buying another set for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: James W. Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Great durability.
customer_reviews.text: Great bags but they leave a white residue. When they land on the board. It does not go away.
customer_reviews.author: Bramirez5

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for volleyball practice and drills. They are good quality and have proven to be quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Pflum

customer_reviews.title: First game, the stitching started coming out
customer_reviews.text: These bags appeared to be sturdy, but the stitching began to come out after one game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used them two of the bags split (the fabric itself, not at the seams). The bags seem small, perhaps underfilled.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Cornhole
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the product, will definitely buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Bradley(Ashley)Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early and heavy duty quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. Very heavy duty. Great for backyard cornhole games.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love um
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value and the pattern is great. Holds up very well in weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: i was not disappointed in the quality. We shall see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Freeman

customer_reviews.title: CORN HOLE BAGS
customer_reviews.text: My son will love these to go with his Michigan Corn Hole Boards!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Busscher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Work as described. If you don’t like them to slide you can wet them.
customer_reviews.author: Livin2bdad

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold. Easy to throw. Land perfectly and slide!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Good for low level play
customer_reviews.text: Good price but felt like they had sand in them instead of the corn
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Average bafs
customer_reviews.text: Average bag for the price, I had to smash them to break up the corn!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be ideal replacements.
customer_reviews.text: Used as intended. Only time will determine if they are five star, but so far they are great!
customer_reviews.author: PTplus5

customer_reviews.title: Tell all your corn hole friends!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value and quality and a very reasonable price. They even came in a mesh carrying bag. And of course weather proof. Fantastic buy.
customer_reviews.author: Viclyn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be sturdy and well made. Happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Wilson

product_meta.title: Weather Resistant Cornhole Bean Bags Set of 8 - Duck Cloth - Regulation Size & Weight - Many Color Combinations to Choose from!
feature_bullets: Durable new design premium cornhole bags made with strong material and double stitching to prevent bursting.
Corn hole bags are filled with sand, making them weather resistant so they can handle all weather, rain included!
Perfect for all fun occasions! Kids and adults enjoy playing corn toss at parties, backyard barbecues, reunions, tailgates, and more.
Mesh carrying bag included for easy transport and storage. Set of 8 Cornhole Bean Bags.
Barcaloo stands behind all of its cornhole bag sets with a 100% guarantee. Should anything ever goes wrong with these, we will replace them with a new set.
